### Structure of the book {-}

The book is broken down into small sections that aim to demonstrate a single concept at a time. The companion text, [Data Manipulation Techniques with R](https://andreavillanes.github.io/R_Data_Manipulation_Techniques/) introduces the foundations of programming in R. This book is a work in progress. Submit any issues  [here](https://https://github.com/IAA-Faculty/statistical_foundations/issues). Please check back frequently for updates.
